text: Villers-sous-Châtillon is a former commune. It is in Grand Est in the Marne department in northeast France. On 1 January 2023, it was merged into the new commune of Cœur-de-la-Vallée. == Related pages == * Communes of the Marne department == References == Category:Former communes in Marne
title: Villers-sous-Châtillon
